entry.title: Upgrading to Django 4.2
entry.summary:
Description

In this session, Kim Kwang-hyun shares practical tips and lessons learned from upgrading a Django project to version 4.2. The talk covers challenges encountered during the upgrade process, how to handle deprecated features, and strategies to ensure a smooth migration for production services. This session will be valuable â€¦
entry.content:
Description

In this session, Kim Kwang-hyun shares practical tips and lessons learned from upgrading a Django project to version 4.2. The talk covers challenges encountered during the upgrade process, how to handle deprecated features, and strategies to ensure a smooth migration for production services. This session will be valuable for developers planning a Django version upgrade.
